pr_title: Adding array transform functions: array_average, array_max, array_min, array_sum

timeline.bodyText: Remove the underscore so that it works for both arrayAverage and array_average?
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: I think we can always return doubles for this function to keep the consistent behavior between aggregation and transform.
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: For INT, use _argument.transformToIntValuesMV(projectionBlock) for better performance (avoid extra casting). Same for FLOAT
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: (nit) Move the declaration into the for look for better readability
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: (nit) Cache intValuesMV[i].length, same for other places
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang
Jackie-Jiang

timeline.message: Adding array transform functions: array_average, array_max, array_min, array_sum
